newsitem.title: USA: Artistic Greetings sees sales rebounding.
newsitem.headline: Artistic Greetings sees sales rebounding.

text.p: Artistic Greetings Inc said on Friday it expects sales to rebound in the remainder of the year.

Artistic Greetings reported second-quarter earnings of $0.01 per share, compared to $0.07 for the same period a year ago. Sales for the recent quarter were $22.2 million, compared to $22.3 million for the year-ago period.
The company said in a news release that the second quarter traditionally has lower sales volumes, but it expects sales to improve in the second half of 1997.
Artistic Greetings makes personalized products and sells them through newspapers, magazines and its mail-order catalog.
